ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] NPE in QuotaEnforcer.checkQuotas()
ygData.msgSnippet: I applied your patch Søren.  I also added FINE level logging when a statistics category is null.  If you get a chance, you might run with FINE level logging

I applied your patch S�ren.  I also added FINE level logging when a 
statistics category is null.  If you get a chance, you might run with 
FINE level logging enabled -- add 
org.archive.crawler.prefetch.QuotaEnforcer.level = FINE to 
heritrix.properties -- and paste output into the issue so we can figure 
if null stats are legit or not.

Thanks,
St.Ack



S�ren Vejrup Carlsen wrote:
>
> Dear all.
>
> Our harvesting depends on the QuotaEnforcer.
> However, the QuotaEnforcer in 1.10.1 (v. 1.7) generate a 
> NullPointerException, whenever
> bad URI is given to the checkQuotas() method.
>
> This causes a lot of noise in the logs.
>
> I rapported bug 1593540 some time ago:
> https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=539099&aid=1593540&group_id=73833 
> <https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=539099&aid=1593540&group_id=73833>
>
> The latest QuotaEnforcer still have this problem.
>
> I would very much like this to be fixed in the next version of Heritrix.
>
> Regards
> ----------------------------------------------------------
> S�ren Vejrup Carlsen, Department of Digital Preservation, Royal 
> Library, Copenhagen, Denmark
> tlf: (+45) 33 47 48 41
> email: svc@... <mailto:svc%40kb.dk>
